programme.title: The Edge S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: The Edge is a technology news TV program which is created for long-term investors seeking upcoming trends in technology and innovation. Explore the endless possibilities of innovation. Get to know the new ideas of products that will change your life in no time. The future begins today, find out about first tourists to space, brand new concept train that will change the idea of travelling, processing DNA data and much more.

programme.title: Renee Fleming S1
programme.desc: CNBC's Tania Bryer meets American soprano Renée Fleming to learn about her career and her tireless campaign to further the understanding that music can have our lives and bodies.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (The Fast and the Fraudulent) S1 (n°179)
programme.desc: «The Fast and the Fraudulent»Scott Tucker swindles millions of cash-strapped borrowers in a payday loan scam with his convenient online loan business and uses the profits to fuel his racecar team dreams.

programme.title: Sustainable Future S1
programme.desc: Can Nuclear energy be the solution to combatting the climate crisis? A new documentary, "Nuclear Now", makes the case for atomic energy.

programme.title: The Brave Ones S1
programme.desc: She was bullied and overlooked at school due to her dyslexia and when she started her business in the 1970s she was dismissed for being a female in a male dominated industry, but Barbara Corcoran never gave up and soon this Brave One became one of New York's most successful real estate moguls. Here she describes her incredible journey in her own words.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley (The Ideal Marriage (Part 1)) S3 (n°21)
programme.desc: «The Ideal Marriage (Part 1)»In part one of "The Ideal Marriage," Pastor Bayless shows you how to make your marriage the best it can be.

programme.title: Secret Lives of the Super Rich (Floating Mansion & "glamping" With the Stars) S1 (n°610)
programme.desc: «Floating Mansion & "glamping" With the Stars»Chopper out to the Hamptons to tour a mega-mansion with a rooftop tennis court designed by Venus Williams. Go "glamping" at the luxe wilderness retreat where celebs pay big bucks to sleep in tents that rival five-star hotel suites. See why wealthy car lovers are paying Lambo prices for the "anti-supercar" that doesn't have power steering or brakes. Take a sip of a billionaire's signature cocktail that comes with a head-spinning price tag. Go coastal inside a floating California mansion. Scour a diamond mine in Botswana for the perfect multimillion-dollar rock. Check out the modern mountain mansion in the swanky ski town packed with famous neighbors. Escape to the posh Hawaiian resort where dinner and champagne are served on top of a volcano. And take a bite of the most expensive potato chip on the planet.

programme.title: Golf : Open de McKinney
programme.desc: PGA Tour golf tournament AT&T Byron Nelson is held at the Four Seasons Resort and Club Dallas at Las Colinas in Irving, Texas, U.S. The tournament is well known also for being the leading fundraiser for charity on the PGA Tour.

programme.title: Ibiza Marathon
programme.desc: Ibiza Marathon is a long-distance foot race that takes place at the colourful and popular Spanish island. Tune in and see all the action and highlights from this exciting sporting event!

programme.title: Imola, Italy
programme.desc: The Michelin Le Mans Cup is an International sports car racing endurance series inspired by the 24 Hours of Le Mans race and run by the Automobile Club de l'Ouest.

programme.title: Imola, Italy
programme.desc: European Le Mans Series believes in the team spirit during long distance performance. The duty of the ELMS is to offer its competitors a full season to race their cars on some of the best tracks in Europe, while keeping tight control of the costs associated with running in a top European wide series. The champions are offered a place on the grid of the 24 Heures du Mans, which gives an extra, important dimension to the title race across the three categories.

programme.title: Sustainable Future S1
programme.desc: Can Nuclear energy be the solution to combatting the climate crisis? A new documentary, "Nuclear Now", makes the case for atomic energy.

Here she describes her incredible journey in her own words.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Generous with Other People's Money) S1 (n°55)
programme.desc: «Generous with Other People's Money»Billionaire Tom Petters was a respected CEO for more than a decade. His companies included iconic American brands like Polaroid, Sun Country Airlines, and Fingerhut. But these legitimate businesses were purchased with dirty money...and his reputation was built on a foundation of lies.

programme.title: NBC Nightly News
programme.desc: Join American journalist Lester Holt as he provides a comprehensive report on the latest national and international stories, featuring interviews with the relevant persons involved in the day's news. Lester and his guests offer adept analysis to help you make sense of the frantic stories emerging from the world of politics, economics and social issues. Nightly News also features a segment titled Making a Difference, where we celebrate ordinary Americans doing extraordinary deeds to benefit their surrounding local communities.
